# Java-Utility2.0
## References Backup

### OO Principles
* Open/closed principle - software entities (classes, modules, functions, etc.) should be open for extension, but closed for modification.


### Java Basic
[Java Language Specification](https://docs.oracle.com/javase/specs/jls/se8/html/index.html)

[Java Virtual Machine Specification](https://docs.oracle.com/javase/specs/jvms/se8/html/index.html)

[Processing Data with Java SE 8 Streams, Part 1](http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/articles/java/ma14-java-se-8-streams-2177646.html)

[Part 2: Processing Data with Java SE 8 Streams](http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/articles/java/architect-streams-pt2-2227132.html)

[Java 8 in Action](https://www.manning.com/books/java-8-in-action)

[深入理解abstract class和interface](https://www.ibm.com/developerworks/cn/java/l-javainterface-abstract/)

[Java线程](https://www.kancloud.cn/digest/java-thread/107456)


### Libraries
[Protocol Buffer Basics: Java](https://developers.google.com/protocol-buffers/docs/javatutorial)

[Mockito – Using Spies](http://www.baeldung.com/mockito-spy)

[Embedding Jetty](http://www.eclipse.org/jetty/documentation/9.0.6.v20130930/embedding-jetty.html)
